Variable.doc: If true, automatically reload Hammerspoon config when any `.lua` files inside `hs.configdir` changes
Variable.name: auto_reload_config
stripped_doc: If true, automatically reload Hammerspoon config when any `.lua` files inside `hs.configdir` changes

doc:
Automate some Hammerspoon configuration tasks

Download: [https://github.com/Hammerspoon/Spoons/raw/master/Spoons/Hammer.spoon.zip](https://github.com/Hammerspoon/Spoons/raw/master/Spoons/Hammer.spoon.zip)

Method.doc: Reload config only if any of the Lua files in `files` have changed
Method.name: autoReloadConfig
stripped_doc: Reload config only if any of the Lua files in `files` have changed
Method.desc: Reload config only if any of the Lua files in `files` have changed

Method.doc:
Binds hotkeys for Hammer

Parameters:
 * mapping - A table containing hotkey objifier/key details for the following items:
  * config_reload - Manually trigger a config reload
Method.name: bindHotkeys
parameters: * mapping - A table containing hotkey objifier/key details for the following items:
* config_reload - Manually trigger a config reload

Method.doc:
Start the Spoon. At the moment this includes:
 * Set up the file watcher for auto-config-reload
